channel.title: The Geeker's Way
channel.description: Recent content on The Geeker's Way

item.title: Why Emacs is better than Vim
item.description: Emacs has unbelievable features for almost unlimited expension vesus Vim. Basically speaking, Vim has lower entry for beginners to easily try how to edit files by a couple of minutes to practice only if you could memorize some fundermental commands. While Emacs will frustrate people without patience then quickly losing curiority on keeping on.

item.title: Common Lisp
item.description: Common Lisp is a dialect of lisp languages family which has the most matured features than others. Since the popularity of Java, Clojure co-exists in JVM system has more welcome by the developers.

item.title: Why text editor is so fancinating
item.description: Text editor is an intergal part for human beings when carefully articulate the thoughts. People are not like machines that the recording capablity depends on the pieces of parts made up of metal and wires rather than flexible abilities.
